item.title: CVE-2024-22291|2024-01-31T12:45:06.846Z -- Marco Milesi -- Browser Theme Color
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Marco Milesi Browser Theme Color.This issue affects Browser Theme Color: from n/a through 1.3.
